question: With reference to the revolt of the year 1857, who of the following was betrayed by a friend captured and put to death by the British?
explanation: The British forces had failed to subdue him for over a year. He was however betrayed into the hands of the British by his trusted friend, Man Singh, while asleep in his camp in the Paron forest. He was captured on 7 April 1859 by a detachment of native infantry from British General Richard John Meade\'s troops led to him by Singh and escorted to Shivpuri where he was tried by a military court.
